= Release Todo List =

*When releasing gmock:*
 * Create an updated documentation page 
 * Remove the snapshot in pom
 * Tag the release
 * Increment the current version and snapshot it
 * Install the artifact in the gmock.org repository
 * Make the artifacts available on google code
 * Update gmock.org documentation
 * Change gmock.org version number
 * Update the download page
 * Update the roadmap
 * Deploy gmock.org
 * Announce it
